name: TAS Test Data Dashboard
description: Dashboard to allow researchers for the TAS Test Dimentia Research team to create new database tables and add / view data of the created tables. Allows non-technical researchers to easily interact with the database. Project is closed-source.

name: Baby Tracker
description: Cross-platform mobile application that allows parents to record and track their baby's feeds, nappies, and sleeps.

name: Sword Smithy
description: Live out your dreams of being a medieval blacksmith! Hours of content with many weapons to craft and customers to satisfy.

name: Room 24: VR Experience
description: A short VR experience that challenges the player to stack a tower of blocks while under extreme pressure.

name: Port Arthur AR Experience
description: Learn about the history of Port Arthur and its inhabitants through this astounding AR application.

name: Gambling Awareness w/ Yoda AR
description: Learn the dark side of gambling from non other than grand master Yoda.

name: Sad but Square
description: A charming puzzle game that challenges the player to navigate varied obstacle courses with limited movement options.

name: Cave Divin
description: Run, jump, and glide through the dangerous depths of the cursed cave to save your girlfriend.
